PHRASE.LANG: This bundle contains the male and female versions of 3 costumes ("The Beheaded", "The Head on a Plate" and "The Gorilla Cage"), as well as the "Zombie Walk" locomotion object. [#Legal]

Ce bundle contient 3 costumes ("le décapité", "la cage au gorille" et "la tête sur un plateau"), dans la version pour homme et la version pour femme, ainsi que le moyen de locomotion intitulé "la marche des zombies". [#Legal]

Dieses Bundle enthält die männlichen und weiblichen Versionen von 3 Kostüme (die Geköpfte, der Kopf auf einer Servierplatte, und Der Käfig des Gorillas), sowie der wanderte Zombie Fortbewegung Objekt.[#Legal]
Questo bundle contiene 3 costume ("il decapitato", "la gabbia del gorilla" e "la testa su un vassoio"), nella versione per uomini e donne, e mezzi di locomozione chiamati "lo zombie errante".[#Legal]

Este buindle contiene 3 trajes ("el decapitado", "la jaula de las gorilas" y "cabeza en una bandeja"), en la versión para hombres y mujeres, y medios de locomoción llamados "el zombie errante".[#Legal]
This bundle contains the male and female versions of 3 costumes ("The Beheaded", "The Head on a Plate" and "The Gorilla Cage"), as well as the "Zombie Walk" locomotion object. [#Legal]
This bundle contains the male and female versions of 3 costumes ("The Beheaded", "The Head on a Plate" and "The Gorilla Cage"), as well as the "Zombie Walk" locomotion object. [#Legal]
